txt.en: There are haystacks throughout Fenmarch.\n\nDrytwald asked you to search the hay that he delivered for his ring.
Drytwald is west of the Mead Hall of Fenmarch.\n\nYou were able to find Drytwald's ring near one of the haystacks and should return it to Drytwald.

'She is going to do away with me! I cannot find my ring anywhere. I have been delivering hay for many summers and have never lost it. I wager it is near one of the haystacks...but which one?

'I must begin preparing dinner. If I do not, I will be in even more trouble than I already am.

'It must be at one of the haystacks that I delivered today. It should not be too difficult to find. Could you please search for my ring?'
Drytwald lost his wedding band while he was delivering hay throughout Fenmarch.
'You found it? I knew I could rely upon you. I hope it was not too difficult to find.\n\n'Now my wife will not make me sleep in the marsh again. How could I ever possibly repay you?'
